what: Thank you, appreciation and anumodana to the following people who have contributed to this project with their time, expertise and with material support… parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikā'ti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
for thousands of small corrections and suggestions for improvement
for creating the original MDict exporter
for the technical expertise, and the GoldenDict exporter that started this whole chain of events
for help with the JavaScript in the GoldenDict and MDict exporters
for internet classes on the classical Pāḷi grammars during Covid
for detailed grammatical analysis of Dīgha Nikāya and Theragāthā
for the Python technical support helpline
who has made suggestions through the feedback form
who I have erroneously forgotten to thank
Thank you to all the monasteries and their supporters which have sustained my livelihood as a bhikkhu
